ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day the first blast shudders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day the convulsive (first blast) shatters convulsively
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Day when the quaking will cause a violent convulsion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when the first trumpet sound blasts
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On the day when the trembling one will tremble. (The disbelievers will certainly taste the punishment.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: On the Day the Rajifah shakes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The day on which the quaking one shall quake,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when the first blast shivers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when the first trump resoundeth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On the Day when a violent convulsion will convulse [the world],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A Day shall come whereon the quaking will quake,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the day when the Quaker quakes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: One Day everything that can be in commotion will be in violent commotion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: On the Day (when the first blowing of the Trumpet is blown), the earth and the mountains will shake violently (and everybody will die),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On the Day, the shiverer shivers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when the Quake quakes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:6] the day when the Tremor quakes, that is to say, the first blast, as a result of which everything will be shaken violently (thus it [the subject] has been described in terms of the effect it produces),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: So Allah said: (On the day when the first trump resoundeth) this refers to the first blowing of the trumpet when everything will quake.
